title: Jon and Daenerys -Survivors (Paralel scenes)
description:
Guys this is my bigest gift for every Jonerys fans. I was working whole day because I wanted to gift you all happiness. 
Happy Weekend Jonerys Family. we are the greatest fandom I know <3  I am so proud of you all <3 
This is the bigest chemistry,love and couple in whole tv history. HBO made the bigest love during  years without Dany and Jon’s reunion. this is the greatest work of showrunners,writers and of course genial GRRM.
I am very happy how every scenes followed each other
How every scenes are inspiration of  each other
two dragon who was borne for each other.
Just enjoy and be happy.  watching video and subscribe my chanel . 
I hope you  alll like it. Thank you

tags: a song of ice and fire

summary:
Remember these scenes from S5
Imagine it will be Daenerys and the Northerners 
T̶o̶r̶m̶u̶n̶d̶ Northerners : The day I ask my...
body:
Remember these scenes from S5

Imagine it will be Daenerys and the Northerners

T̶o̶r̶m̶u̶n̶d̶ Northerners : The day I ask my people to fight with the C̶r̶o̶w̶s̶ Targaryen is the day my people cut my guts from my belly and make me eat them.

J̶o̶n̶ Dany: And how many of your people can’t fight? The women, the children, the old, the sick, what happens to them? You’re condemning them to death. Worse than death because you’re too proud to make peace. Or maybe you’re not proud. Maybe you’re just a coward.

K̶a̶r̶s̶i̶ Northeners: I lost my father, my uncle, and 2 brothers fighting the damn C̶r̶o̶w̶s̶ Targaryens

J̶o̶n̶ Dany: I’m not asking you to forget your dead. I’ll never forget mine.I̶ ̶l̶o̶s̶t̶ ̶5̶0̶ ̶b̶r̶o̶t̶h̶e̶r̶s̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶n̶i̶g̶h̶t̶ ̶t̶h̶a̶t̶ ̶M̶a̶n̶c̶e̶ ̶a̶t̶t̶a̶c̶k̶e̶d̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶w̶a̶l̶l̶(Maybe changed to Robert’s rebellion) . But I’m asking you to think about your children now. They’ll never have children of their own if we don’t band together. The Long Night is coming and the dead come with it. No clan can stop them. The free folk can’t stop them. The Night’s Watch can’t stop them. And all the southern kings can’t stop them. Only together, all of us, and even then it might not be enough, but at least then we’ll give the fuckers a fight.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary:
I see a lot of people saying "Daenerys saved his life and lost a dragon,
 it's normal for him to do that". So, no, sorry. That...
caption:
I see a lot of people saying “Daenerys saved his life and lost a dragon, it’s normal for him to do that”. So, no, sorry. That he feels indebted to her is one thing. But there, it is not only him that he engages but ALL the North. Should I remind you Ygrid who saved his life and was even ready to oppose her own to protect him ? But he leave her behind without a glance while he loved her.

There is a big difference between being indebted to someone and submitting thousands of people to that person. Especially when these people categorically say they do not trust this woman and they do not want to be submissive. And not only does he do it on a whim but sends a simple letter to his sister just telling her that he did it? There is a problem.


I hope the writers have a specific purpose in doing that. I think it’s not trivial that Jon bends the knee AFTER Daenerys says she’ll help him. Because it makes no sense.

There is a war for the survival of humanity. The important thing is to fight. Daenerys agrees to help him, perfect : attack !! It will always be time AFTER the war to submit if Jon AND the North decide that it is worth it. But there, when he has never seen Daenerys rule, never saw her fight, never saw her in face of her enemies, that he looks at her dragons as weapons of massive destruction, that he is OBLIGED to tell her that to burn the people of King’s Landing is not right and so on. .. He can not make such a decision. Especially that it is ABSOLUTELY not the moment. He has held good until now and there he bows when he is not asked anymore? He is not a simple soldier, he is a king! Even though he never wanted power he accepted that role. And a king does not submit so easily without at least one conversation explaining his decision with Ser Davos. And we do not have it. Which makes me say that this will quickly be broken in the next season.


Either it is a heaviness scenario to create a twist in the next season and a confrontation. Either, there is manipulation in the air.﻿

tags: with fans like these who needs enemies
summary: Poor Jon Snow.  A portion of his so-called “fans” assassinate his character 24/7.  They’ve turned him into LittleFinger/Ramsey...
body: Poor Jon Snow. A portion of his so-called “fans” assassinate his character 24/7. They’ve turned him into LittleFinger/Ramsey 2.0 and claim he’s sexually manipulating Dany all for some resources she already gave him freely. They rage that if he actually does love Dany, he’s a complete moron, a doormat, and a servant whom they’ve lost all respect for. And now they’re calling him fat… 😐 But yet these people swear up and down they’re his biggest fans.

blog.name: jackoshadows
blog.title: Jak O' the Shadows
blog.description: I’m not going to swear an oath I can’t uphold. Talk about my father if you want. Tell me that’s the attitude that got him killed. But when enough people make false promises, words stop meaning anything. Then there are no more answers - only better and better lies. And lies won’t help us in this fight - Jon Snow.

tags: Jonsa fans acting like victims after spending the entire hiatus shitting on every other character except for Sansa
summary:
Jonsa fans: Jon is deliberately
seducing and playing Dany to use her dragons because his true love is Sansa. He does not really...
body:
Jonsa fans: Jon is deliberately seducing and playing Dany to use her dragons because his true love is Sansa. He does not really love Dany and is using her. He is essentially like LF who used and seduced Lysa Aryn for the Vale. If he is not playing Dany then he is an incompetent, idiotic, selfish fool who betrayed Sansa by bending the knee and should have stayed dead after season 5. Kit looks so ugly next to depressed Emilia, Haha! Kit and Emilia are bad actors, Jon looks like he is having a panic attack when he is with Dany, Dany forced Jon to sleep with her – she’s so evil! Sansa should undermine Jon, he is such an idiot. Go Sansa! Undermine Jon, yass girl!

Jonsa fans: Dany is an evil, power hungry tyrant who deserves to get seduced, die alone and miserably, killed by the man she loves etc. She’s as bad as Cersei, even worse! – she burned those poor, innocent, nice Tarlys! Here are several long’metas’ and  hundreds of gifsets about evil Dany again and again. Did you know that Dany asked people to bend the knee?! Like that right there tells us how evil she is – Here’s a gif of the evil blood sucking vampire queen of the Queen of the damned Vampire Chronicles asked people to bend the knee!! See? Dany is so evil! Like how dare she?

Jonsa fans: Arya and Bran are irrelevant. One is a killer and the other is a cripple. Sansa is the most important character of ASoIaF because she’s the most important Stark and the story is all about the Starks! She’s the KEY TO THE NORTH – because Tywin, LF, Roose etc. said so. The entire series is about the STARKS and NORTHERN INDEPENDENCE which basically means the entire series is about SANSA because who cares about Arya and Bran – they are going to serve Sansa and her plot, die or go away. Arya will be Sansa’s executioner and Bran will be Sansa’s adviser – that’s what their stories have been leading up to this entire time. A TIME FOR WOLVES! STARKS FOREVA!

Jonsa fans: Why does everyone hate us?! Whyyyyyy? We are such nice guys, honestly! We love Dany, Jon, Arya, Bran so much!  – We just think they would all be so much more interesting as dark characters!  Except for Sansa – she’s the most compassionate, intelligent best queen with no flaws. We are such expert book readers and film students/cinematographers unlike Jonerys and other folks who lack reading comprehension and really think that Jon and Dany are in love with each other haha! We are all experts trained in art history, film, literature, culture, ancient history, science, engineering and that’s why we know for sure that Jonsa will certainly happen in both the books and show unlike the other poor fools who are unable to see the subtlety and beauty of Jonsa that GRRM/D&D are writing! They all just hate Sansa and that’s why they hate us and Jonsa. Poor us. Jonsa is coming, Jonsa is endgame, wargs before targs etc!!

On that note, what does wargs before targs even mean with respect to Jonsa/Sansa, considering that Jon is a full blooded Targaryen who is also one of the strongest wargs in the books along with Bran and Arya and Sansa is the weakest warg in the series having never even warged once after Lady’s death early in the first book? That phrase is just so…nonsensical. As are most things put out by the Jonsa fandom lol!

On that note, what does wargs before targs even mean with respect to Jonsa/Sansa, considering that Jon is a full blooded Targaryen who is also one of the strongest wargs in the books along with Bran and Arya and Sansa is the weakest warg in the series having never even warged once after Lady’s death early in the first book? That phrase is just so…nonsensical. As are most things put out by the Jonsa fandom lol!

trail.content_raw:
Jonsa fans: Jon is deliberately seducing and playing Dany to use her dragons because his true love is Sansa. He does not really love Dany and is using her. He is essentially like LF who used and seduced Lysa Aryn for the Vale. If he is not playing Dany then he is an incompetent, idiotic, selfish fool who betrayed Sansa by bending the knee and should have stayed dead after season 5. Kit looks so ugly next to depressed Emilia, Haha! Kit and Emilia are bad actors, Jon looks like he is having a panic attack when he is with Dany, Dany forced Jon to sleep with her – she’s so evil! Sansa should undermine Jon, he is such an idiot. Go Sansa! Undermine Jon, yass girl!

Jonsa fans: Dany is an evil, power hungry tyrant who deserves to get seduced, die alone and miserably, killed by the man she loves etc. She’s as bad as Cersei, even worse! – she burned those poor, innocent, nice Tarlys! Here are several long’metas’ and  hundreds of gifsets about evil Dany again and again. Did you know that Dany asked people to bend the knee?! Like that right there tells us how evil she is – Here’s a gif of the evil blood sucking vampire queen of the Queen of the damned Vampire Chronicles asked people to bend the knee!! See? Dany is so evil! Like how dare she?

Jonsa fans: Arya and Bran are irrelevant. One is a killer and the other is a cripple. Sansa is the most important character of ASoIaF because she’s the most important Stark and the story is all about the Starks! She’s the KEY TO THE NORTH – because Tywin, LF, Roose etc. said so. The entire series is about the STARKS and NORTHERN INDEPENDENCE which basically means the entire series is about SANSA because who cares about Arya and Bran – they are going to serve Sansa and her plot, die or go away. Arya will be Sansa’s executioner and Bran will be Sansa’s adviser – that’s what their stories have been leading up to this entire time. A TIME FOR WOLVES! STARKS FOREVA!

Jonsa fans: Why does everyone hate us?! Whyyyyyy? We are such nice guys, honestly! We love Dany, Jon, Arya, Bran so much!  – We just think they would all be so much more interesting as dark characters!  Except for Sansa – she’s the most compassionate, intelligent best queen with no flaws. We are such expert book readers and film students/cinematographers unlike Jonerys and other folks who lack reading comprehension and really think that Jon and Dany are in love with each other haha! We are all experts trained in art history, film, literature, culture, ancient history, science, engineering and that’s why we know for sure that Jonsa will certainly happen in both the books and show unlike the other poor fools who are unable to see the subtlety and beauty of Jonsa that GRRM/D&D are writing! They all just hate Sansa and that’s why they hate us and Jonsa. Poor us. Jonsa is coming, Jonsa is endgame, wargs before targs etc!!

That phrase is just so…nonsensical. As are most things put out by the Jonsa fandom lol!

blog.name: mimi0108
blog.title: Mimi0108
blog.description: I feed on cinema, tv shows, books, animals, history, music, travel, photography and especially laughter.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: And if Daenerys was the hero of her story but the antagonist in GRR Martins story
title: And if Daenerys was the hero of her story but the antagonist in GRR Martins story
body:
The closer we get to the end, the more I see the big painting that the author wants.
Jon & Daenerys are the two protagonists of the story. But where many see resemblances, I see above all a willingness of the author to mark the difference.
I am more and more convinced that Jon is the hero and Daenerys the antagonist. As the author says : “any antagonist is the hero of his own story”.

Jon was born a bastard, engaged in the Night Watch by idealism and learn to progress. He experienced disillusionment, grief, injury and defeat. But he also learned to open his mind (wildlings), to be stratge, to lead etc …
Daenerys was born legitimate, had a lot of rough tests but, from season 2, did not learn anything and have too much power.

She is resting more and more on her titles, does not know how to reign (she is more a conqueror), does not learn from her mistakes and almost never recognizes her faults. She never shows mercy like if death is the only punishment (Mossador). She impulsively pronounces cruel sentences, does not necessarily execute them herself, and does not look into the eyes of those she executes (unlike Jon). She almost never listens to her advisers and, when she does, it is often too late and counterproductive.

It is not trivial that the story shows us that those who burn people are not good leaders (the Mad King, Stannis Melisandre etc …). This is a pretty clear clue that Daenerys is not a good queen. She did not propose any system to Meereen after having taked the city. And we are shown that she thinks she knows what is good for EVERYONE. People have to do what she wants, to have the same vision that her.
This is called a tyrant. Someone who thinks to act for the common good but which imposes a unique thought, her only will etc … She becomes more and more categorical “follow me/bend the knee or die”. To quote Star Wars: Dark Vador “if you not with me, your my ennemy”. Obi-Wan “Only a Sith is so absolute”.

For me, Season 8 will be the opposition between Jon and Daenerys.
Although I really want her to learn and go back to Meereen to lead, I think she’s gone too far to get by now.

summary: Whenever I see someone complain about Jonerys looking "fat" on the EW cover, I'm like, of course they gained weight! Dany is...
body: Whenever I see someone complain about Jonerys looking “fat” on the EW cover, I’m like, of course they gained weight! Dany is obviously super pregnant and clearly hiding a bump, and Jon, being a loving hubby, is obviously going through sympathetic pregnancy with wifey. 🤷🏽‍♀️ That’s what loving married couple about to have a baby looks like…

blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: Un mundo de mentiras
description:
by 0Aressama1

Los crió y los amo como sus hijos, les dio el nombre de una madre y un hogar pero no había nada mas terrible para un Targaryen que estar solos en este mundo. La guerra de los Cinco reyes ha comenzado, pero tal vez la lealtad entre hermanos no es tan fuerte, Jon cuestiona a Robb “Sabes vencer pero tus decisiones personales harán que perdamos esta guerra”. Mientras que Arya sueña con una doncella de cabellos plateados que vuelva sobre un Dragon.

Que pasaría si Jon junto con Arya hubieran nacido como hermanos Gemelos.

Words: 3448, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Español

blog.name: turtle-paced
blog.title: turtle-paced
blog.description: Writing at the speed of the race course paradox.

summary: Supposing Robert had found out about Jon's true parentage, which would have infuriated him more: the fact that Jon was Rhaegar...
question: Supposing Robert had found out about Jon's true parentage, which would have infuriated him more: the fact that Jon was Rhaegar Targaryen's son or the fact that he was Lyanna Stark's son?
answer:
Depends what he learns, exactly. If he simply learns that Jon’s the son of Rhaegar and Lyanna, it’s the former, which he takes as concrete proof of rape, and he takes it out on Jon.

If, by contrast, Robert somehow learns that Lyanna ran away with Rhaegar voluntarily, it’s the latter. Idealisation of Lyanna becomes demonisation of Lyanna, and he takes it out on Jon.

summary: And then they revealed the end game on the cover of an insanely popular Entertainment magazine. Yeah, Sure by writing END GAME...
body: And then they revealed the end game on the cover of an insanely popular Entertainment magazine. Yeah, Sure by writing END GAME in big bold letters. So subtle.
